transliteration: karmany evadhikaras te ma phalesu kadacana
translation: You have a right to action alone, never to its fruits.

sanskrit: योगस्थः कुरु कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा धनञ्जय
transliteration: yogasthah kuru karmani sangam tyaktva dhananjaya
translation: Established in yoga, perform action, abandoning attachment, and remain even-minded in success and failure.

transliteration: apuryamanam acala-pratistham samudram apah pravisanti yadvat
translation: As rivers enter the ever-full and unmoving ocean, so one who remains undisturbed attains peace.
Surrender all actions to Me with your mind centered in the Self, free from longing and selfishness.

sanskrit: यदा यदा हि धर्मस्य ग्लानिर्भवति भारत
transliteration: yada yada hi dharmasya glanir bhavati bharata
translation: Whenever righteousness declines and unrighteousness rises, I manifest Myself.
Let a person lift oneself by oneself; let one not degrade oneself.

transliteration: yato yato niscalati manas cancalam asthiram
translation: Whenever the restless mind wanders, bring it back under the control of the Self.
Those who meditate on Me with single-pointed devotion, I preserve what they have and provide what they need.

sanskrit: अद्वेष्टा सर्वभूतानां मैत्रः करुण एव च
transliteration: advesta sarva-bhutanam maitrah karuna eva ca
translation: One who has no hatred for any being, who is friendly and compassionate, is dear to Me.

transliteration: sarva-dharman parityajya mam ekam saranam vraja
translation: Abandon all limited duties and take refuge in Me alone; I will free you from all sorrow.
